channel.title: Vote for gold
channel.description: when i compile i get this error [code]client.java:69: inner classes cannot have static declarations public static Connection con = null; ^ client.java:70: inner classes cannot have static declarations public static Statement stm; ^ client.java:72: inner classes cannot have static declarations public static void createConnection() { ^ client.java:81: inner classes cannot have static declarations public static ResultSet query(String s) throws SQLException { ^ client.java:97: inner classes cannot have static declarations public static void destroyCon() { ^ client.java:106: inner classes cannot have static declarations public static boolean checkVotes(String playerName) ^ client.java:125: inner classes cannot have static declarations public static boolean voteGiven(String playerName) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 7 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I was doing this tut. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=434617.0 Can someone help?

item.title: Vote for gold
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

now i get this error

[code]client.java:69: inner classes cannot have static declarations
public static Connection con = null;
^
client.java:70: inner classes cannot have static declarations
public static Statement stm;
^
client.java:129: non-static method query(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced
from a static context
query(“UPDATE Votes SET recieved = 1 WHERE username = '”

  • playerName + “’”);
    ^
    client.java:125: inner classes cannot have static declarations
    public static boolean voteGiven(String playerName)
    ^
    client.java:11269: non-static method createConnection() cannot be referenced fro
    m a static context
    MYSQL.createConnection();
    ^
    client.java:11270: non-static method checkVotes(java.lang.String) cannot be refe
    renced from a static context
    if(MYSQL.checkVotes(playerName)){
    ^
    Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
    Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
    6 errors
    Files Compiled Successfully!
    Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Vote for gold
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

remove the keyword ‘static’ from all of those lines of errors you just got

Not sure if it will work or not, so make a backup of the file
